title: Priority queue doesn't reset after a period of time??
body: So literally I hadn't left a game in like months, I then got in to a ranked game, couldnt connect til like 19 min. After the game I got a 20 minute priority queue, yea like the 10 other 20 minute priority queues I had in the past.... Idk , I didn't go afk on purpose, I couldn't connect. Please give me your thoughts.
